description: This file implements a chat interface in a React web application. It manages conversations, messages, subscriptions to real-time message updates via Supabase, and UI rendering for chat interactions.

methods.name: ChatPage
methods.description: Main React component for the chat page, handling state, fetching data, subscriptions, and rendering the chat UI.

methods.name: loadMessages
methods.description: Fetches messages for the selected conversation.

methods.name: subscribeToMessages
methods.description: Sets up a real-time subscription to new messages for a specific conversation via Supabase.

methods.name: createConversation
methods.description: Creates a new conversation with a user-provided title.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a new message in the current conversation.
